goal.ch:
1. 深入理解學術寫作要素
2. 理解研究論文寫作架構
3. 提升英文論文寫作能力
goal.en:
Developing a deeper understanding of key elements of 
academic writing
Understanding the structure/organization of research papers
Improving English writing skills

outline.ch:
閱讀含下列主題的文章:
‧如何有效地閱讀論文，並透過閱讀提升學術英文寫作能力
‧認識學術論文架構和論文寫作過程
‧學習並練習學術論文寫作技巧
‧字彙和文法：學術英文寫作可應用之字彙和句型之介紹
‧了解並避免學術英文寫作常見之錯誤
outline.en:
Reading materials include the following topics:
Developing effective reading skills; improving academic writing through extensive reading
Structure of research paper and the writing process; writing skills
Useful vocabulary and sentence patterns for academic writing
Avoiding common mistakes in academic writing

textbook.ch:
課程使用教材將以PDF或透過連結提供給同學。

參考書：
1. Eckert, K. (2022) Writing Academic Papers in English: Graduate and Postgraduate Level 
2. Wallwork, A., ＆ Southern, A. (2020) 100 Tips to Avoid Mistakes in Academic Writing and Presenting. Cham: Springer International Publishing. 
3. Holst, B. (2015) Scientic Paper Writing - A Survival Guide.
4. Bailey, S. (2011) Academic writing: A practical guide for students. London: RoutledgeFalmer.
textbook.en:
Course materials: Links to useful resources and PDFs will be provided. 

Recommended (not required):
1. Eckert, K. (2022) Writing Academic Papers in English: Graduate and Postgraduate Level 
2. Wallwork, A., ＆ Southern, A. (2020) 100 Tips to Avoid Mistakes in Academic Writing and Presenting. Cham: Springer International Publishing. 
3. Holst, B. (2015) Scientic Paper Writing - A Survival Guide.
4. Bailey, S. (2011) Academic writing: A practical guide for students. London: RoutledgeFalmer.
